Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019H&S insurance will never go wrong (aka shield plans or ISP in Singapore).Its medisave payable, and helps to prevent bills bursting over a limit. Be it for public or private hospital, best to upgrade to the one you can afford. If cost is an issue, even the standard plan is good. Medishield life is very inadequate for 10% of bills that exceed medishield life claim limit.5 comments0
